name: Bath and shower curtains Villeroy & Boch
description: Bath and shower curtains Villeroy & Boch, Sanitana, Roca, Ideal and Cersanit set 94 In the archive: - Rectangular bathtub Villeroy & Boch MY ART https://www.villeroy-boch.ru/vannaja-i-velnes/produkcija/My-Art-Vanna-prjamougolnaja-model-UBQ170MYA2V.html Size: 1700 x 750 mm - Bath Ideal CONCEPT size: 1700x750 mm. - Bath Sanitana Hotel size: 1700x750 mm. - Bath Cersanit FLAVIA - Villeroy & Boch CETUS bathtub Rectangular-Model-UBQ170CEU2V.html Size: 1700 x 750 mm - faucets, shower systems, panels and curtains are also included. The model is made for corona render 1.5 and vray 3.6. In the vray version, BRDF materials are installed in the Microfacet GTR / GGX, vray 2.4 owners need to install BRDF in Blinn. Excellent renderings to you! Show more
